BadgeDetail.Name: Marketing Strategy
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated they can accurately identify their market demographic and segments. They understand their needs, know how to reach them and the costs of various channels available. They can clearly articulate the unique selling point of their business idea and have a developed a pricing, positioning and distribution strategy.

Task.Title: Marketing strategy
Task.Body: Upload a marketing strategy for your business using the template provided.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload a marketing strategy for your business using the template provided.
